Articles.Content:
Hello! i bought the game yesterday and i have loads of fun with it,

But, a few questions:

-the Space Stations with Solar Panels:

How they work? They have any possibilities to grow? After i put they in orbit, i can attach a new rocket to him?

There are a few mods that add animated solar panels. The [Collection] Kosmos Spacecraft Design Bureau (SSPP 4.1 6/12/12) pack and the

[0.16] Electrical Energy Plugin | v1.4.2 (Sep 9)

As far as connecting things in space, there is no docking in game currently but is planned. You can use a mod called

[0.16.0] [Plugin] Orbital & Planetary Construction V9.3 to build things in space.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi faelcks, welcome to the community

The good captain has already pointed out a few good mods you can try, also it's possible to fake a station with stock parts, the new long ladders can be used as ersatz solar panels for instance, and landing legs make nifty antennas.

Currently there is no docking, so attaching a craft to a station is undertaken using landing legs or claws of some kind to grab and hold on.
